alert.note: Alert for Delta; Fannin; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 3:08PM CDT until April 20 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Delta County in north central Texas... Southwestern Lamar County in north central Texas... Southeastern Fannin County in north central Texas... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 308 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Honey Grove, or 11 miles east of Bonham, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Paris, Honey Grove, Roxton, Dodd City, Lake Crook, Lake Gibbons, Sumner, Forest Hill, Ladonia, Pecan Gap, Windom, Toco, Atlas, Noble, Glory, Broadway Junction, Allens Point, Dial, Biardstown and Howland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
